<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="comment">/// ArgList - Ordered collection of driver arguments.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The ArgList class manages a list of Arg instances as well as</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="comment">/// auxiliary data and convenience methods to allow Tools to quickly</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="comment">/// check for the presence of Arg instances for a particular Option</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="comment">/// and to iterate over groups of arguments.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/opt/arglist"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/opt/arglist/#a65954e42e1dd42746f957601cf6216ce">ArgList</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
